about_the_game:
In the wake of his sister Asha's kidnapping, Bleak is thrust into the perilous world of Pinnacle. With his loyal surveyor bot, Glitch, by his side, he faces hostile factions, mysterious landscapes, and hidden dangers. Together, they uncover ancient secrets and confront their own fears, all in a quest to rescue Asha. As they journey deeper, Bleak discovers inner strength and forges an unbreakable bond with Glitch. In a final showdown against evil forces, they must overcome adversity to reunite with Asha and confront the darkness lurking within Pinnacle. Do you dare?

Featuring
- 40+ Platforming levels (Multiple ways of beating levels that change the path you take)
- Competitive Time Trial Online Leaderboards
- 3 playable characters with unique mechanics
- Massive lore that spans thousands of years across seven original races
- Strong focus on single-player narrative story telling
- 35+ original songs

BLEAK Remastered is a visually stunning and technically enhanced version of the original game "BLEAK: Welcome to Glimmer", boasting brand new artwork and a revamped game engine. Set in the dystopian world of Glimmer, players will find themselves immersed in a dark and atmospheric adventure unlike any other.

The remastered version features meticulously crafted artwork, with updated graphics that breathe new life into the game's environments, characters, and animations. From the haunting landscapes of Glimmer's desolate urban sprawls to the intricate details of its futuristic technology, every aspect of the game's visuals has been reimagined to deliver a truly immersive experience.

In addition to the visual overhaul, the remastered edition also introduces improvements to the game's engine, enhancing performance, stability, and overall gameplay mechanics. Players can expect smoother controls, optimized performance on a variety of platforms, and a more seamless gaming experience from start to finish.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or beyond
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or beyond; 256 MB or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 (Snow Leopard)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Most Built-in Graphics Cards
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
